attributes.action: bulldoze St. Andrews and build a shrine to Aston Villa Football Club.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see the Birmingham City ground bulldozed and the land be put to better use.  We propose a shrine to the 1982 European Cup winners paid for by David Gold.

We would also like Steve Bruce to perform the opening ceremony.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
